title: Dirty Mary
description: A young girl, abused, traumatized, and diagnosed with dissociative identity disorder, struggles to survive while life-long antagonists seek to destroy her. The personalities stemming from her dissociative identity disorder divide her authentic self into Dirty Mary (the seductress), Savage Mary (the fighter), and Sweet Mary, the innocent personality she had before the traumatic experiences that still torment her.
author: Danny Marvin
